sourcesContent:
import React, { useReducer, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { form_reducer, form_reducer_default_value } from "./form_reducer"; export default function UseReducer() { const firstnameRef =useRef({}) const [formvaluewithreducer , dispatch]=useReducer(form_reducer,form_reducer_default_value) const [formvalue , setformvalue]=(useState({form_reducer_default_value})) const [submittedData, setSubmittedData] = useState(null); const displaysubmit=(e)=>{ dispatch({type:"INPUT_CHANGE" ,name: firstnameRef.current.name }) const currentTarget = e.currentTarget const id= currentTarget.id console.log("ffffffffff" , id) let value = undefined switch(currentTarget.type) { case 'text': value=currentTarget.value break ; case "checkbox" : value = currentTarget.checked } setformvalue((preventstate)=>{ return {...preventstate , ...{[id]:value} } }) console.log("ddddd",formvalue) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } return( <> {JSON.stringify(formvalue)}
firstname lastename ans checkbox
{JSON.stringify(formvalue.firstname)} {JSON.stringify(formvalue.lastename)} {JSON.stringify(formvalue.ans)} {JSON.stringify(formvalue.checkbox)}
) }
